metadata.title: Ombre Brazilian Hair Body Wave Ombre Burgundy Hair Bundles 300g Virgin Hair Remy Human Hair Weave Dark Roots Color #1B 99J Body Wave Weave Hair Extension 18 20 22 inches
features: 【Material】7A grade virgin unprocessed Brazilian remy human hair. Straightened, permed, curled, easily styled just like your own hair.
【Quality】No shedding, no tangle, no lice, lasting silky look and feel soft. Can be last more than 6 months with proper care.
【Texture】Brazilian hair Body Wave weaves color #1B/99J ombre. Shiny, full, bouncy hair make you always stay in style. Hair will remain shiny and plump after times of washing.

【Package】3 Bundles Only; Each Hair Bundle is 100(+-5)gram=3.5(+-0.2)oz; Every Bundle Ture to Length and Full to Weight, Tips: 8"-16" needs 3 bundles,18"-26"needs 4 bundles,28"-32" needs 4-5 bundles to make a full head.
description: Avankwig, establish a new era of fashion with you!
Grade 7A Unprocessed Brazilian Virgin Human Hair, Natural and Healthy
Every weft is with double layer for reinforced & minimum shedding, Strong and Neat
100±5g/bundle, maybe a little different because of the length of the hair
How long can it be last?
The hair is human hair, we use best hair spray and suitable temperature to hold the hair pattern. So in general it can be last 8 months with good care.
About 100g/bundle. Usually 3 bundles are enough to make a full head. If you like THICKER or need LONGER hair, it's best to wear one more bundle,as the Longer the Length is, the Thinner the hair is.
Why there is No Shedding with our hair?
No more than 3% shedding of the new hair is within the whole industry standard,our quality is higher:Double Machined  Weft and Korean Glue make the weft strong  and no shedding.
Why is the hair weave getting Shedding and tangle?

Because of drying, grease and dirt accumulation, salt water, chlorine gas and comb (untie) ,your hair is curly, your hair is tangled.So make sure washing and nursing your hair at least once a week,or twice a week.
